# Dad Joke Wars

### Visit [dadjokewars.com](https://www.dadjokewars.com/) and play!

Dad Joke Wars takes the popular [dad joke face off videos](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dad+Joke+Battle&ei=oLmsY8WFMoTgkPIPxpyguAU&ved=0ahUKEwjF1dibpZ38AhUEMEQIHUYOCFcQ4dUDCBA&uact=5&oq=Dad+Joke+Battle&gs_-qQJoCHABeACAAW6IAdYRkgEEMjkuMZgBAKABAbABCrgBAsABAdoBBAgBGAo&sclient=gws-wiz-serp) and turns it into a game multiple people can play.

This game currently uses the random [icanhazdadjoke](https://icanhazdadjoke.com/) joke API.

Thanks for checking out my App! I created this game to continue building my coding knowledge and practice playing around with some new tools such as [Redux](https://redux.js.org/) and the [Redux Toolkit](https://redux-toolkit.js.org/).

#### Git Commands:

```
npm i
npm start
npm build
```

#### Updates to come:

- Add duplicate name verification method
- Adding and implementing the [Tailwindcss](https://tailwindcss.com/) framework
- Add round logic
  - Podium order
    - 1st place highlighted at end of game
  - Sudden death round
    - Logic for tie between top players
    - New round with top players begins
    - Plays until one laughs and the other doesn't
- Option to use unfiltered/unsensored dad jokes from different API
